amendment.description: An amendment No. 53 printed in House Report 113-170 to prohibit the use of funds to implement sequestration-related furloughs of civilian Department of Defense employees.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 53 printed in House Report 113-170 to prohibit the use of funds to implement sequestration-related furloughs of civilian Department of Defense employees.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lamborn amendment (A047) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lamborn amendment (A047) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A047) offered by Mr. Lamborn.
